sentences.english: The manufacturing of wood veneers takes great skill as well as experience.
sentences.chinese: 木材的单板生产需要很大的技巧，以及经验。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to use spine immobilization techniques in trauma victims.
sentences.chinese: 有能在创伤患者身上使用脊椎板固定技巧。

sentences.english: Shorthand and typewriting have been described as the twin arts.
sentences.chinese: 速记和打字被说成是一对孪生技巧。

sentences.english: Prevarication is one of the techniques the businessman prefers to employ.
sentences.chinese: 搪塞是这个商人喜欢使用的技巧之一。

sentences.english: Social competency has a big impact on communication and is essential for post-school outcomes.
sentences.chinese: 社交技巧对沟通有很大的影响，是毕业后的重要表现。

sentences.english: Do you employ risk reduction techniques without fail?
sentences.chinese: 你是否使用风险降低技巧并从没失手？

sentences.english: Among the Basic techniques are cross-stitch, crewel work, and quilting.
sentences.chinese: 最基本的技巧是十字针锈和绗缝绣。

sentences.english: According to some, seeking prominence is part of an inborn survival strategy.
sentences.chinese: 据一些科学家说，寻找显著性是与生俱来的生存技巧。

sentences.english: That's a favorite literary technique of the biblical author.
sentences.chinese: 这是圣经作家极爱的一种文学技巧。

sentences.english: Tearing suggests control about the fingers's techniques.
sentences.chinese: 建议撕纸的时候要控制手指的技巧。

sentences.english: So he taught me how to improve my skills.
sentences.chinese: 于是他教我如何完善我的技巧。

sentences.english: Excellent written and spoken translation skills.
sentences.chinese: 优秀的书面及口语翻译技巧。

sentences.english: It is the art or principles of interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 诠释学是关于诠释的技巧和原则。

sentences.english: For some people, mind body techniques such as meditation also might be helpful.
sentences.chinese: 对于某些人，身心技巧如冥思也是有用的。

sentences.english: A really nice trick is to switch off your monitor when you’re typing.
sentences.chinese: 一个非常好的技巧是在打字的时候关掉显示器。

definition: a trick/an ingenious method/know-how/the knack (of doing sth)
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
the key trick/the secret of success
to grasp (often fig.)/to control/to seize (initiative, opportunity, destiny)/to master/to know well/to understand sth well and know how to use it/fluency
